text: The men's discus throw event at the 2002 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Kingston, Jamaica, at National Stadium on 17 and 18 July. A 1.75 kg (junior implement) discus was used. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Wu Tao ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Dmitriy ==Participation== According to an unofficial count, 34 athletes from 28 countries participated in the event. ==References== Discus throw Category:Discus throw at the World Athletics U20 Championships
